CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1951, pg. 25, reads: "BON VOYAGE - Members of the swank Cimmiron Club of young men feted member Sydney Smith last week on the eve of his departure for New York where he has taken up residence. Held in smart home of the Russell Sheltons on Idlewild Street, the party was gay with lovely young matrons and lots of fun.  Pictured in the midst of members of the Cimmerettes and guests is Mr. Smith, Seated are Sarah Brown, Susan Dinkins, Jayne Shelton, Sydney, Lois Weaver, Isabelle Stewart and Rachel Brooks.  Standing: Hazel Garland, Kay Jones, Betty Tibbs, Cleo Jones, Betty Watkins, Dorothy Barrow, Edna Britton, Mildred Bass, Norma Duncan, Lois Hall and Claudell Smith. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Cimmerettes and Cimmiron Club members, seated: Sarah Brown, Susan Dinkins, Jayne Shelton, Sydney Smith, Lois Weaver Watson, Isabelle Stewart, and Rachel Brooks; standing: Hazel Garland, Kay Jones, Betty Tibbs, Cleo Blakney Jones, Betty Watkins, Dorothy Barrow, Edna Britton, Mildred Bass, Norma Duncan, Lois Hall, and Claudell Smith, posed in living room with floral curtains, home of Russell Shelton on Idlewild Street
